Content.Text:
<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Y-You really surprised me! How can you
approach without giving away the
slightest hint of your presence?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I guess I just failed to noticed you,
then. My apologies.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm just picking out some ore to forge
with, actually.
<PAGE>
This latest batch is all top quality
material, so it's really hard to choose!
<PAGE>
Would you like to take a look, <MYNAME>?
Maybe you can help me.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
My training for today is to make an
alloy by combining multiple different
ores together.
<PAGE>
I feel like making some farm tools using
steel from iron, or using bronze from
copper...
<PAGE>
But I also feel like using some gold or
silver to make some more decorative
items.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
S-Sorry, I didn't mean to hit you with
all of that. You must be quite bored!
<PAGE>
I think it's a little odd, too. A woman
like me talking so passionately about
rocks and ore... odd, isn't it?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You really mean that? I don't think
anyone has ever said that to me before.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You think it's totally normal to talk
about the material used to make things?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Of course! <MYNAME>, your own work
involves making things on your farm or
for the farm, doesn't it?
<PAGE>
Although we make different things, and
use different materials, ultimately we
do the same work, don't we?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, thank you.
<PAGE>
You can tell me a little about yourself,
if you like?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I had a lot of fun today! Thank you so
much. Do you think we could talk like
this again some time?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Great. I'm looking forward to it
already.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I knew it. Yes, of course I knew it.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
No need to apologize. Just like I said,
I'm well aware of this fact myself.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Why don't we change to a subject that
we can both enjoy a little more?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you for coming to see me today!
Take care on your way home.
